attributes.description:
2020 TOYOTA ETIOS CROSS 1.5 Xs 5Dr
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery
Smash & Grab Window Protection

attributes.description:
Barely on the road and the all-new BMW 3 Series Sedan is already leaving everything behind it, including conventions and expectations. Once again, the icon displays how to reinvent itself. After all, with the pioneering design language, it stands for the dawning of a new era. Propelling the ultimate sports sedan are even more powerful and efficient engines.

All vehicles quality checked by our highly qualified BMW technicians, to ensure your vehicle is as good as new. 
Contact one of our very friendly and highly professional sales staff members to tailor your deal on this vehicle today! Finance can be arranged. 
Test drives and trade ins welcome!

attributes.title: 2021 BMW 3 Series 320i M Sport Launch Edition

attributes.description:
Not a typical coupé but rather an incredible experience: the first-ever BMW 2 Series Gran Coupé introduces a new form of authority with a bold character to the compact class. It is above all the uncompromising, performance-oriented aesthetic that unmistakeably reveals its ambitions. Not elegant but extravagant. Not conventional but individual. Not ordinary – but extraordinary. In keeping with high-end technologies and perfectly tuned driving dynamics features, the BMW 2 Series Gran Coupé stands out from the crowd with ease and pursues its very own path.

All vehicles quality checked by our highly qualified BMW technicians, to ensure your vehicle is as good as new. 
Contact one of our very friendly and highly professional sales staff members to tailor your deal on this vehicle today! 
Finance can be arranged. Test drives and trade ins welcome!

attributes.description:
TOYOTA STARLET 1.4 Xi
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXSTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Brackenfell Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Kia Konfidence Brackenfell TEAM NOW!

attributes.description:
KIA SELTOS 1.6 EX
Exquisite and classy Seltos in fantastic condition. White 2022 model. Full service history. Central locking, airbags and power steering with controls on steering wheel. Reverse camera and sensors, electric mirrors and electric windows. Manual transmission. A comfortable drive for you and your family over long and short distances. Radio with bluetooth and USB port. Ready to be test driven, trade ins are accepted. Nationwide delivery. Visit your KIA Konfidence in Wilropark, Roodepoort and come take a look at this extraordinary Seltos.
